esqlQuery.esql:
// Alert when network interfaces show sustained error rates (>5 errors/sec or >0.5% of packets).
// Excludes loopback/container interfaces, enforces minimum traffic, and clamps counter resets.
// Tune thresholds in the final WHERE clause for your environment.
FROM metrics-system.network-*
| WHERE system.network.name NOT RLIKE "^(lo|docker|veth|br-)"
| STATS
in_error_delta = MAX(system.network.in.errors) - MIN(system.network.in.errors),
out_error_delta = MAX(system.network.out.errors) - MIN(system.network.out.errors),
in_packet_delta = MAX(system.network.in.packets) - MIN(system.network.in.packets),
out_packet_delta = MAX(system.network.out.packets) - MIN(system.network.out.packets),
first_ts = MIN(@timestamp),
last_ts = MAX(@timestamp)
BY host.name, system.network.name
| EVAL elapsed_sec = TO_DOUBLE(TO_LONG(last_ts) - TO_LONG(first_ts)) / 1000
| WHERE elapsed_sec >= 60
| EVAL in_error_delta = CASE(in_error_delta >= 0, in_error_delta, 0)
| EVAL out_error_delta = CASE(out_error_delta >= 0, out_error_delta, 0)
| EVAL in_packet_delta = CASE(in_packet_delta >= 0, in_packet_delta, 0)
| EVAL out_packet_delta = CASE(out_packet_delta >= 0, out_packet_delta, 0)
| EVAL total_packets = in_packet_delta + out_packet_delta
| WHERE total_packets >= 1000
| EVAL in_error_rate = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, in_error_delta / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL out_error_rate = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, out_error_delta / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL in_error_pct = CASE(in_packet_delta > 100, 100.0 * in_error_delta / TO_DOUBLE(in_packet_delta), 0.0)
| EVAL out_error_pct = CASE(out_packet_delta > 100, 100.0 * out_error_delta / TO_DOUBLE(out_packet_delta), 0.0)
| WHERE in_error_rate > 5
OR out_error_rate > 5
OR in_error_pct > 0.5
OR out_error_pct > 0.5
